abilities.description: Luffy holds his feet together and kicks with both simultaneously via his toes, creating a powerful spear-like attack that pierces forward.
abilities.significance: This becomes one of Luffy's signature kicking techniques, demonstrating his growing mastery of his Devil Fruit powers.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Yari Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts the Gomu Gomu no Yari technique during his battle with Kuro, using it to counter Kuro's incredible speed.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's ability to develop new techniques mid-battle and expand his combat repertoire.

reveals.information: The Gomu Gomu no Mi allows Luffy to create spear-like kicking attacks by holding his feet together
